stepTitle: The average velocity of the stone over the time interval: $$[1, 1.05]$$ is $$4.955$$. The average velocity of the stone over the time interval: [1, $$1.01]$$ is $$5.151$$. The average velocity of the stone over the time interval: $$[1, 1.005]$$ is $$5.1755$$. The average velocity of the stone over the time interval: [1, $$1.001]$$ is $$5.1951$$. Use these statements to guess the instantaneous velocity of the stone at $$t=1$$ sec. Round to the nearest tenth.
